title: First Look Teaser for 'In Your Dreams' Magical Animated Adventure
description: "The Sandman can make your dreams come true!" Netflix has revealed a first look teaser trailer for a new animated movie arriving this year titled In Your Dreams, another new take on a "what if dreams came to life" concept. We already have Pixar's Dream Productions series on Disney+ (and the Slumberland movie), and this is coming soon to Netflix this fall. In Your Dreams is a comedy adventure about Stevie and her brother Elliot who journey into the absurd landscape of their own dreams. If the siblings can withstand a snarky stuffed giraffe, zombie breakfast foods, and the queen of nightmares, the Sandman will grant them their ultimate dream come true...the perfect family. "What if your dreams could become reality?" This was just unveiled with a preview at the Annecy Film Festival in France. The voice cast features Jolie Hoang-Rappaport, Elias Janssen, Craig Robinson, Simu Liu, Cristin Milioti, Omid Djalili, Gia Carides, SungWon Cho, Zachary Noah Piser. Featuring music by John Debney. And with animation from Kuku Studios & Sony's Imageworks. This looks super fun and weird and wacky! As a movie about dreams should. Here's the first teaser trailer (+ poster art) for Alex Woo's In Your Dreams, […]
author: Alex Billington
excerpt: "The Sandman can make your dreams come true!" Netflix has revealed a first look teaser trailer for a new animated movie arriving this year titled In Your Dreams, another new take on a "what if dreams came to life" concept. We already have Pixar's Dream Productions series on Disney+ (and the Slumberland movie), and this
text: TRAILERS by June 12, 2025Source: YouTube "The Sandman can make your dreams come true!" Netflix has revealed a first look teaser trailer for a new animated movie arriving this year titled In Your Dreams, another new take on a "what if dreams came to life" concept. We already have Pixar's Dream Productions series on Disney+ (and the Slumberland movie), and this is coming soon to Netflix this fall. In Your Dreams is a comedy adventure about Stevie and her brother Elliot who journey into the absurd landscape of their own dreams. If the siblings can withstand a snarky stuffed giraffe, zombie breakfast foods, and the queen of nightmares, the Sandman will grant them their ultimate dream come true...the perfect family. "What if your dreams could become reality?" This was just unveiled with a preview at the Annecy Film Festival in France. The voice cast features Jolie Hoang-Rappaport, Elias Janssen, Craig Robinson, Simu Liu, Cristin Milioti, Omid Djalili, Gia Carides, SungWon Cho, Zachary Noah Piser. Featuring music by John Debney. And with animation from Kuku Studios & Sony's Imageworks. This looks super fun and weird and wacky! As a movie about dreams should. Here's the first teaser trailer (+ poster art) for Alex Woo's In Your Dreams, direct from Netflix's YouTube: Searching for a family adventure that won’t break the bank? Coming to Netflix this fall, In Your Dreams takes you on a fantastical journey from the comfort of your own home. In this enchanting tale, Stevie (voiced by Jolie Hoang-Rappaport) and her brother, Elliot (voiced by Elias Janssen), venture through an absurd world of their own imagination to make their family perfect again. If the siblings can withstand a snarky stuffed giraffe, zombie breakfast foods, and the queen of nightmares, their dream just might come true. In Your Dreams is directed by the animation filmmaker Alex Woo (aka Alexander Woo), making his feature directorial debut after working on many "Go! Go!" specials previously, and other short films. Co-directed by Erik Benson. The screenplay is written by Erik Benson and Alex Woo; from a story by Alex Woo and Stanley Moore. Produced by Timothy Hahn & Gregg Taylor. With animation by Kuku Studios and Sony Pictures Imageworks. Netflix will debut Alex Woo's In Your Dreams animated adventure movie streaming on Netflix starting November 14th, 2025 later this fall. How does that look so far? Anyone into this one? Find more posts in: Animation, Streaming, To Watch, Trailer prev next
html:
TRAILERS

by
June 12, 2025
Source: YouTube

"The Sandman can make your dreams come true!" Netflix has revealed a first look teaser trailer for a new animated movie arriving this year titled In Your Dreams, another new take on a "what if dreams came to life" concept. We already have Pixar's Dream Productions series on Disney+ (and the Slumberland movie), and this is coming soon to Netflix this fall. In Your Dreams is a comedy adventure about Stevie and her brother Elliot who journey into the absurd landscape of their own dreams. If the siblings can withstand a snarky stuffed giraffe, zombie breakfast foods, and the queen of nightmares, the Sandman will grant them their ultimate dream come true...the perfect family. "What if your dreams could become reality?" This was just unveiled with a preview at the Annecy Film Festival in France. The voice cast features Jolie Hoang-Rappaport, Elias Janssen, Craig Robinson, Simu Liu, Cristin Milioti, Omid Djalili, Gia Carides, SungWon Cho, Zachary Noah Piser. Featuring music by John Debney. And with animation from Kuku Studios & Sony's Imageworks. This looks super fun and weird and wacky! As a movie about dreams should.

Here's the first teaser trailer (+ poster art) for Alex Woo's In Your Dreams, direct from Netflix's YouTube:

Searching for a family adventure that won’t break the bank? Coming to Netflix this fall, In Your Dreams takes you on a fantastical journey from the comfort of your own home. In this enchanting tale, Stevie (voiced by Jolie Hoang-Rappaport) and her brother, Elliot (voiced by Elias Janssen), venture through an absurd world of their own imagination to make their family perfect again. If the siblings can withstand a snarky stuffed giraffe, zombie breakfast foods, and the queen of nightmares, their dream just might come true. In Your Dreams is directed by the animation filmmaker Alex Woo (aka Alexander Woo), making his feature directorial debut after working on many "Go! Go!" specials previously, and other short films. Co-directed by Erik Benson. The screenplay is written by Erik Benson and Alex Woo; from a story by Alex Woo and Stanley Moore. Produced by Timothy Hahn & Gregg Taylor. With animation by Kuku Studios and Sony Pictures Imageworks. Netflix will debut Alex Woo's In Your Dreams animated adventure movie streaming on Netflix starting November 14th, 2025 later this fall. How does that look so far? Anyone into this one?

Find more posts in: Animation, Streaming, To Watch, Trailer
